metadata.title: CVE-2016-2853 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: The aufs module for the Linux kernel 3.x and 4.x does not properly restrictthe mount namespace, which allows local users to gain privileges bymounting an aufs filesystem on top of a FUSE filesystem, and then executinga crafted setuid program.

criterions.comment: linux-gke package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi-realtime package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-realtime package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
